page.title: 19BASILDON NE: LOCAL NEWS I
page.content:
Items in the news recently include:
1.{Unemployment.}New government limits on board and lodging allowances mean that many unemployed youngsters are homeless. Many are sleeping in garages or abandoned cars.
2.{Vandalism.}Local children are to be shown a film warning of the dangers of dropping rocks and bricks onto passing trains, and of playing on or near railway lines.
3.{Viewdata.}Basildon Council has launched a Viewdata system carrying nearly 6000 pages of information about local happenings, such as children's events, and council matters such as rent rebates. There is a local firms' trade directory, too.
